So, no, I won't be backing down. I'll keep spreading the truth, no matter how unpopular it is. I'll keep warning people about the dangers of vaccines and the medical establishment's stranglehold on our health. And I'll keep fighting for real health, real wellness, and real freedom – freedom from the toxic grip of the medical-industrial complex.
